etymology.description: 大同 (Datong; ‘great harmony’) + 区(區) (‘district’) = Datong District.
etymology.interpretation: Proper name for an administrative district of Taipei named ‘Datong’. 大同 evokes the Confucian ideal of great harmony, while 区/區 marks it as an administrative division.
etymology.simplification: 區 was simplified to 区 (adopting an older variant and reducing components) in Mainland usage; Taiwan retains 區. 大 and 同 are unchanged.

examples.chinese: 大同区是台北市的一个行政区(大同區是臺北市的一個行政區)。
examples.pinyin: Dàtóng Qū shì Táiběi Shì de yí gè xíngzhèng qū.
examples.english: Datong District is an administrative district of Taipei City.

examples.chinese: 名称源自“大同”理念，表示社会大同的理想(名稱源自「大同」理念，表示社會大同的理想)。
examples.pinyin: Míngchēng yuánzì “Dàtóng” lǐniàn, biǎoshì shèhuì dàtóng de lǐxiǎng.
examples.english: The name comes from the concept of “great harmony,” signifying an ideal of a harmonious society.

examples.chinese: 区内有迪化街和宁夏夜市等景点(區內有迪化街和寧夏夜市等景點)。
examples.pinyin: Qū nèi yǒu Díhuà Jiē hé Níngxià Yèshì děng jǐngdiǎn.
examples.english: It contains attractions such as Dihua Street and Ningxia Night Market.
